archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.1.1e: e) develops progressively over time (e.g. on a project-by-project basis) or through an initiative focused on architecture (e.g. as part of a transformation programme).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
